subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Bob Knight, who joined ESPN as a guest studio analyst during last season’s N.C.A.A. tournament, is expanding his role to include game commentary. Knight will work a Thursday night game each week starting Jan. 15, and he will call some nonconference matchups on other days.
